assisted.name: Assisted
assisted.desc: The number of enemies that this character assisted in defeating.

battlesParticipated.name: Battles Participated
battlesParticipated.desc: The number of battle this character has participated in.

damageDealt.name: Damage Dealt
damageDealt.desc: The total number of damage dealt.

damageTaken.name: Damage Taken
damageTaken.desc: The total number of damage taken.

selfHealed.name: Self Healed
selfHealed.desc: The total number of healing received.

targetHealed.name: Target Healed
targetHealed.desc: The total number of healing given out.

timesDied.name: Times Died
timesDied.desc: The total number of times this character has died.

timesRested.name: Times Rested
timesRested.desc: The number of times this character has rested at an inn.

feasted.name: Times Feasted
feasted.desc: The number of times this character has enjoyed a feast.

mentored.name: Times Mentored
mentored.desc: The number of times this character has been mentored by Alex.

timesHunted.name: Times Hunted
timesHunted.desc: The number of times this character has been out hunting.
